Posts.Content: Just to add a lighter note - I too often wear normal bras - I'm too mean to throw them away! One day I was gardening and I heard a "plop" and there on the earth, nestling among the weeds, was my false boob- .I made a note to be careful where I wore them in future ( mind you, it was a very old saggy bra!). I'm going to a swimming group for cancer patients for the first time tomorrow and shall go boobless, as I was told if you don't have a proper swimsuit with a pocket, the prosthesis can float away! Now that WOULD be embarrassing!
Posts.Title: post mastectomy bra

Posts.Content: Received a request from this "Khadja" yesterday. I was mystified, as I am new to the site and haven't posted anything yet. I was just about to accept as a friend as I couldn't imagine what harm there could be, but now I am forewarned, so many thanks to everyone for the advice! bridesmotherf
Posts.Title: Beware
